rules.title: General Eligibility
items: Exclusively for students of Ananda College.
Individual participation only; no team entries.
Plagiarism will result in immediate termination.
Using AI or AI content is strictly prohibited.

rules.title: Submission Protocol
items: Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission.
Format: Grade_Name.zip (e.g. 11_NaveenPerera.zip).
Include 5 workspace screenshots as proof of process.
Submit both final output and project files.

poster.title: Technical Specifications
items: Format: .png or .jpg files
Minimum resolution: 300 DPI
Recommended size: A3 or larger
Color mode: RGB for digital, CMYK for print

poster.title: Submission Requirements
items: Include 5 workspace screenshots showing your design process
Submit project files (PSD, AI, or equivalent)
Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission
File naming: Grade_Name.zip (e.g., 11_NaveenPerera.zip)

3d.title: Technical Specifications
items: Accepted formats: .obj, .fbx, .blend, or native project files
Include rendered images (PNG/JPG, 300 DPI minimum)
Provide at least 3 different angle renders
Maximum polygon count: 500k triangles

3d.title: Submission Requirements
items: Include 5 viewport screenshots showing modeling process
Submit both project files and final renders
Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission
File naming: Grade_Name.zip (e.g., 11_NaveenPerera.zip)

video.title: Technical Specifications
items: Format: .mp4 (H.264 codec)
Resolution: Minimum 1080p (1920x1080)
Frame rate: 24fps, 30fps, or 60fps
Maximum duration: 3 minutes

video.title: Submission Requirements
items: Include 5 timeline screenshots from your editing software
Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission
File naming: Grade_Name.zip (e.g., 11_NaveenPerera.zip)
Ensure final export includes audio (if applicable)

manipulation.title: Technical Specifications
items: Format: .png or .jpg for final output
Minimum resolution: 300 DPI
Project files mandatory (PSD, XCF, or equivalent)
Include source images used in manipulation

manipulation.title: Submission Requirements
items: Submit both final image and editable project file
Include 5 screenshots showing manipulation layers/process
Provide list of sources for any stock images used
Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission
File naming: Grade_Name.zip (e.g., 11_NaveenPerera.zip)
